title: Psych Majors: Check Out “The Mappr”!
description:
Psych majors: getting ready for mid-term exams? Let me know what you think of a new tool I built which I call the “MAPPR”. That stands for “Make A Personal Psych Review” (best name I could come up...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
